instructions: Go to the Apple website for resetting your Apple ID . Log in to your account using your Apple ID username. Enter your phone number, then click Continue . Apple sends notifications to the devices that are linked to your Apple ID so that you can reset your password there. If you don't have access to any of those devices, click Don't have access to any of your devices? (located at the bottom of the screen). Whichever option you choose, follow the onscreen prompts to unlock your account or reset your password.
